column4: I'm trying to write to my external harddrive from the Feisty LiveCD but it won't let me. Can anyone help?
Can someone help me with my external harddrive? I do not have write permissions to it.
what filesystem is the external drive.
I'm not sure and I don't know how to find out. But I'm sure I'm able to access it from both my own laptop running Gutsy, and my other Desktop running Feisty
